## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case
Describe the problem or use case this feature would solve. For example:
- "I want to be able to..."
- "It would be helpful if..."
- "Currently, I have to work around this by..."

## Proposed Solution
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. If you have ideas on how to implement it, please share!

## Alternatives Considered
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, mockups, or examples about the feature request here.

## Benefits
How would this feature improve the project or user experience?
